Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the only goal of the match in the 40th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María stated, 'It was a deserved win. We have to keep working as we always do and stay as united.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ángel Di María will retire from international duty after the Copa América
Others: Argentina will face Guatemala in another friendly on Friday before the Copa America campaign, while Ecuador will face Bolivia on Wednesday and Honduras on Sunday as part of their preparations for the Copa América
